column4: if i have windows license can i install it inside virtualbox ?
my laptop now dual boot, i want to have th edual boot to work inside virtualbox without reinstalling, is that possible ?
If you have bought the boxed version, probably. If your XP came with your laptop/desktop, the license prohibits that.
Still no, because you agreed to the EULA of Microsoft - which is why the free software movement oppose that kind of license.
